snippet: On screen the visual manifestations of humans’ fascination with animals are on the rise.
abstract: Explosion in animal imagery in film and television suggests a rise in human fascination with wildlife and nature; Lives of Animals series at the 92Y Tribeca, among other such exhibits and events, attest to the myriad ways animals have appeared on screen.
lead_paragraph: On screen the visual manifestations of humans’ fascination with animals are on the rise.

headline.seo: Animals Continue to Fascinate Humans: Films Prove It
headline.main: Birds Do It, Bees Do It (Fill Screens)
headline.print_headline: Birds Do It, Bees Do It (Fill Screens)
